text: @EricTrump @realDonaldTrump And I vote that you are the dumbest of #dumbandumber and that you should shut the fuck up!  Thankful I have one of those governors @GavinNewsom who has saved countless lives while your #idiot father has sent many to an early grave. #DoNotOpenCalifornia #PresidentDeath #COVID19
